blur_detection.description: The image shows clear, well-defined text with sharp edges throughout the invoice.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The invoice displays excellent contrast between dark text and light background with clear section demarcations.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed; current contrast levels are optimal for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare, reflections, or overexposed areas detected on the invoice surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Continue using similar lighting conditions for future document captures.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration, or staining visible on any part of the invoice.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue maintaining document in dry conditions.

tears_or_folds.description: The invoice appears free from tears, creases, folds or wrinkles that could affect text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Maintain current document handling practices to preserve document integrity.

cut_off_detection.description: The invoice is completely captured within the frame with all edges visible and no content cut off.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue using current framing technique for document capture.

missing_sections.description: All standard invoice sections are present including header, customer details, billing information, and payment options.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all essential invoice components are captured.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other objects obstructing any part of the invoice content.
obstructions.recommendation: Maintain current document positioning and photography techniques.
